mapper.insert: insert into db_bindlist (SID, BINDID, NUM, OPERTIME, CORPID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ALIAS1) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bindid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alias1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_bindlist set BINDID = #{bindid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUM = #{num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALIAS1 = #{alias1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, BINDID, NUM, OPERTIME, CORPID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ALIAS1 from db_bindlist where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SID, BINDID, NUM, OPERTIME, CORPID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ALIAS1 from db_bindlist
